chapter.title: &ucsUAS;-Update
chapter.para: Dieses Dokument enthält die Changelogs mit den detaillierten Änderungsinformationen zum Update von &ucsUAS; von Version 4.4 v1 nach 4.4 v2. Sofern notwendig, werden wichtige Hinweise zum Update in einem separaten Abschnitt behandelt. Die Changelogs werden nur in Englisch gepflegt. Die Änderungsinformationen für vorherige Versionssprünge finden sich unter .

section.title: Generelle Hinweise zum Update
section.para: Während der Aktualisierung kann es zu Ausfällen von Diensten innerhalb der Domäne kommen. Aus diesem Grund sollte das Update innerhalb eines Wartungsfensters erfolgen. Grundsätzlich wird empfohlen das Update zunächst in einer Testumgebung einzuspielen und zu testen. Die Testumgebung sollte dabei identisch zur Produktivumgebung sein.

section.title: Updateprozess
section.para: Größere Updates für UCS@school werden im Univention Appcenter als eigenständiges App-Update herausgegeben. Kleinere Updates und Fehlerbereinigungen (Errata für UCS@school), die keine Interaktion mit dem Administrator erforderlich machen, werden im Repository der bereits veröffentlichten App-Version von UCS@school herausgegeben. Die Changelog-Dokumente, die Univention mit jeder UCS@school-App-Version herausgibt, werden dann entsprechend um einen neuen Abschnitt erweitert, aus dem ersichtlich wird, zu welchem Zeitpunkt welche Pakete veröffentlicht und welche Fehler dabei behoben wurden.

section.title: Released on 2019-03-31:
section.para:
Source package python-pampy in version 1.8.4-1A~4.3.0.201903160731:
The python-pampy package now handles Unicode strings (49051).

Source package ucs-school-import in version 17.0.5-9A~4.4.0.201903261550:
The script /usr/share/ucs-school-import/scripts/reset_schema_counter was added. It can be used to reset unique username and email counters (42131).
A configuration key csv:allowed_missing_columns was added. It can be assigned a list of column names that are allowed to be missing in the input data (49050).
Internal improvement: the PyHook loading code was consolidated (48958).
Before reading the input data, pre-read hooks are now executed (49049).
An example pre-read hook was added, that can rename the columns of a CSV file before it is read. To activate it, copy /usr/share/ucs-school-import/pyhooks-available/pre_read_modify_csv_header.py to /usr/share/ucs-school-import/pyhooks (49048).
Internal improvement: better logging configuration (49037).

Source package ucs-school-lib in version 12.1.0-18A~4.4.0.201903270740:
Internal improvement: better type hints and Python 3 compatibility (48958).
Internal improvement: better logging configuration (49037).

Source package ucs-school-umc-computerroom in version 11.0.0-2A~4.4.0.201903141616:
Preparations for better browser cache-control have been implemented. (48995)

Source package ucs-school-umc-exam in version 9.0.0-4A~4.4.0.201903141619:
Internal improvement: use the consolidated PyHook loading code (48958).
Preparations for better browser cache-control have been implemented. (48995)

Source package ucs-school-umc-users in version 15.0.0-2A~4.4.0.201903211724:
The password in the "Passwords (teachers)" and "Passwords (students)" modules is now hidden by default and can be shown in clear text via a toggle button (47646).

section.title: Released on 2019-04-11:
section.para:
Source package ucs-school-import in version 17.0.6-4A~4.4.0.201904091329:
It is now possible to enforce the override behavior for dhcpd/ldap/base during school creation (48469).
Additional special characters in usernames can now be configured by the new configuration key username:allowed_special_chars. The default value is backwards compatible with previous UCS@school versions and contains only the dot. Besides the dot, only dash and underscore can also be used (resulting in the configuration value ".-_") (49260).
A hook was added that allows to modify the configuration after reading the configuration files and applying the command line arguments. The base class is ucsschool.importer.utils.config_pyhook.ConfigPyHook (49265).
A hook was implemented that manipulates the configuration depending on the imported user role (49267).

Source package ucs-school-lib in version 12.1.1-2A~4.4.0.201904020901:
It is now possible to enforce the override behavior for dhcpd/ldap/base during school creation (48469).

Source package ucs-school-metapackage in version 12.0.1-1A~4.4.0.201904011404:
During the creation of the demoschool dhcpd/ldap/base is not modified and thus the school created afterwards will take over the DHCP service (48469).

section.title: Released on 2019-05-08:
section.para:
Source package ucs-school-import in version 17.0.6-14A~4.4.0.201905081729:
Improved lookup performance of the shipped syntax classes that slowed down the opening of user objects considerably when a lot of schools exist (49329).
Duplicate hook execution code was removed (48141).
Usernames are now allowed to be longer than 20 characters. Important: Users with usernames longer than 20 characters are excluded from the support regarding Samba, Samba4 connector app and Active Directory connector app. Users with usernames shorter than 21 are still supported. If Windows clients older than Windows 8.1 are in use, the maximum username lenght must not exceed 20 characters, or logging into them will not be possible! Set ucsschool/username/max_length to allow UMC wizards and user import to create users with usernames longer than 20 characters (47222).
The execution time of ou_create_post scripts has been reduced by joining six scripts into two (49423).

Source package ucs-school-lib in version 12.1.1-6A~4.4.0.201905061453:
Fixed a bug which prevented domain lists in internetrules to be changed. (49312).
Getting all UDM objects opened every object twice unnecessarily. (49329).
Hook execution ist now logged (48141).
Usernames are now allowed to be longer than 20 characters. See ucs-school-import for more information (47222).

Source package ucs-school-umc-distribution in version 17.0.0-5A~4.4.0.201905061217:
Collected files can now be stored read-only (49227).
Adding files to projects prior to distribution is now optional (47160).

Source package ucs-school-umc-exam in version 9.0.0-8A~4.4.0.201905071152:
The students result files of a running exam can now be automatically collected. The default is to collect them every 5 minutes. The interval can be configured using the UCR variable ucsschool/exam/cron/backup. The feature can be switched on by setting ucsschool/exam/cron/backup/activated to true. (49227).
The execution time of the ou_create_post hook is now logged (49423).

Source package ucs-school-umc-wizards in version 11.0.0-5A~4.4.0.201905071507:
Usernames are now allowed to be longer than 20 characters. See ucs-school-import for more information (47222).

section.title: Released on 2019-05-20:
section.para:
Source package ucs-school-ldap-acls-master in version 17.0.1-1A~4.4.0.201905101706:
Teachers and Staff cannot modify or create arbitrary shares anymore due to security concerns (49434).
Due to a ACL problem, multi-OU staff users were not replicated to all administrative school slaves. This problem has been fixed (48924).

Source package ucs-school-old-homedirs in version 14.0.1-0A~4.4.0.201905131011:

Source package ucs-school-umc-distribution in version 17.0.1-4A~4.4.0.201905211712:

Internal improvements required for the exam mode (49519).
